name: @zthun/works.users
description: A zthunworks microservice that manages users, profiles, and logins.
author: Anthony Bonta

scripts.docker:publish: docker push zthun/works.users:latest && docker push zthun/works.users:$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
scripts.docker:build: npm pack && docker build . -t zthun/works.users:latest -t zthun/works.users:$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
